body:
Post some times where you were so amazing it looked like you were cheating-/hacking


My Story: In quintus I was the final one with diamond gear. The other team had 5. I rushed in and killed all 5 on 7 hearts. I was so amazed it looked like regen. All I had was 2 gapples too.

title: A time so amazing it looked like hacks

replies.body: one time, I fell into a hole in quintus, along with an iron guy, I was wearing full diamond, there were two other full diamonds, and one iron, I think they were lagging... o-o I strafed through their lines, and killed a diamond and an iron, and 1 other iron and two leathers who came in later, my teammate was killed, and I killed the other diamond, but at the same time, he killed me :( and... i lost my stuff :P

replies.body:
Well, you know the block glitch right? So i was on Senex, and bridging over to the monuments, but i was kinda lagging, and i could see the blocks disappearing, so i started bridging really fast and made it to the other side, but there were 2 guys from the other team shooting at me (they weren't very good), but to them it looked like i was flying :P

They called me a fly hacker soooo many times xP
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Having 5 diamond guys on the opposing team on a bridge, I make a bridge under and broke the block behind them, my team pushed up, so they *attempted* to retreat, and one by one, they fell into the void. The chat was spammed with "OMG HACKS" and "wow team spleef" xP

I then replied "nu hax and nu caps pls"
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
It's happened to me once, too xP
It just has to do with ping and technically destroying the monument before you die but ti doesn't count because the information hasn't been sent to the server yet due to your high ms. You destroy the monument and between the time it takes to send that information, you die :3
I was rendezvous and I rushed right and covered myself in blocks. I was about 5 seconds to getting the monument when someone broke one of the blocks and decided to swing at me with their sword, so I just decided I should keep on mining and try to get lucky and not die. I then died then broke the monument :o
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
This was on another server, FFA (not naming which one)
So I was taking on this guy, then two others (who were a team) joined in and they all tried to kill me at once, So I managed to counter two and smoked out the other one (killed him)
Quickly potted up, did an epic circle strafe, killed one of the other guys.
the last one came at me when I was at 2 hearts and no pots in my hotbar, managed to get a combo, killed him and then enderpearled and died ._.

replies.body: So I was playing overcast once avicus was down. There were these 2 guys making an underground tunnel full diamonds. I found lava and I also had a water bucket.
